EmailTemplate.description: Acura Contract Signed Email to JDP
EmailTemplate.name: JDP- Acura Contract Signed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Account} has signed a contract with Foundation Direct on {!Opportunity.Contract_Signed_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi J.D. Power
{!Opportunity.Account} has signed a contract with Foundation Direct on {!Opportunity.Contract_Signed_Date__c}.
Foundation Direct Package: {!Opportunity.Product__c}
Primary Dealer Contact: {!Opportunity.Contract_Signer__c} {!Opportunity.Contract_Signer_Email__c}
JD Power Team please ensure enrollment via the portal.
If you have any questions, please contact us at Acura@foundationdirect.com.
Thank you, The Foundation Direct Team Acura@foundationdirect.com
